title: US states accuse TikTok of harming young users
description: A group of 14 US states on Tuesday filed lawsuits accusing TikTok of ensnaring young users with addictive features, then harming their minds and violating their privacy. TikTok then hits young users with money-making ads, the lawsuits argue.
content: A group of 14 US states on Tuesday filed lawsuits accusing TikTok of ensnaring young users with addictive features, then harming their minds and violating their privacy.
cleaned_content: a group of <ONE_TEN> us states on tuesday filed lawsuits accusing tiktok of ensnaring young users with addictive features then harming their minds and violating their privacy
